summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Afroboost headphone reservation system. All backend APIs (20/20) and frontend features working correctly. Dark theme with pink/purple neon effects implemented perfectly. Coach authentication and dashboard fully functional.
passed_tests: All 20 backend API endpoints (courses, offers, users, reservations, discount-codes, payment-links, concept, config, coach-auth)
Homepage with Afroboost title and concept description
Display of 2 courses (Afroboost Silent - Session Cardio and Sunday Vibes)
Form fields: Name, Email (required), WhatsApp (required), Promo code
Total display in CHF with proper calculation
Pay button disabled without terms acceptance
Double-click footer access to Coach mode
Coach dashboard with all tabs (Reservations, Concept, Courses, Offers, Payments, Codes)
CSV export functionality in reservations tab
Discount code creation with types (100%, %, CHF)

success_percentage.design: 100% (dark theme with neon effects implemented correctly)
